Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Relates to the membership on the Nassau health care corporation board
Summary: Relates to the membership on the Nassau health care corporation board; provides that the board of directors shall select the chair and the chief executive officer.
LawCode: Amd ยง3402, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to membership on the Nassau health care corporation board
